text: People take part in a community fishing on the occasion of 'Mabh Bihu' in Morigaon district of Assam on Thursday. During the festival, people of Assam organise community fishing and feasts. The whole night is spent singing and dancing in Mejis (temporary shelters made of straw), which are set fire in the morning.— Photo: Ritu Raj Konwar
title: Fishing fest
